entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is mentioned as having a guilty expression on his face. He is also referred to as 'me' by himself.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and is mentioned as being angry with Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts and is mentioned as being on the receiving end of Dumbledore's anger.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is angry with Snape, as indicated by Hagrid's guilty expression and nervous behavior when discussing the topic.
